1.content:
Before we begin I should list the four current characters.

Creepie Creecher:
A goth girl who was raised by bugs. Creepie here is the main character of the show, if it wasn't obvious. She has a curious and sarcastic demeanor.

Chris-alice Hollyroller:
Creepie's best friend and most active girl in the school, and by active I mean is involved with the most clubs, debate, cheerleaders, etc. She is always optimistic.
Carla Cabrera:
One of the popular girls at the school. Not much more about her, though she does seem to be a bit smarter then her friend Melanie.

Melanie Melisma:
Carla's friend, she's dumb and loves shiny things. She almost doesn't seem to notice danger, though I bet that she'd be able to cause some.

choices: To prove insects aren't weak and pathetic.

112.content: Creepie was sat in her house's library happily reading away, soon her mother came up and hoped up next to her. "Creepie, me and your father have been talking for ages about this, but we've decided." Creepie turned to her mom with a raised eyebrow. "What mom?" She asked as she set the book down. "I am going to teach you how to hunt!" Her mother said proudly. Creepie's mouth dropped. "But, but mom! I can't! I'm a human, not a bug or anim-' "Now Creepie, I will except nothing less then for you to learn how to eat larger meals and be able to hunt. Now..." She started to go on about proper hunting style, Creepie tuned out a bit, only paying very minor attention to her mother as she sighed, however, her mom snapped her fingers. "Creepie!" I know you don't want to do this, but you're going to do this, might as well just start at the beginning, I'll teach you how to eat things of different sizes, which would you like, shall we start small, like a burger or a book,' "A book?!" Creepie exclaimed. "Yes Creepie, remember, my cousin's a silverfish. Or, you could learn how to eat things the same size as you, which will it be?"

114.content:
Creepie's eyes fluttered open. She sat up in her bed and yawned, stretching her arms.

"Another day of school. Greeeat," she groaned out, when suddenly her stomach let out a room shaking roar. "Eugh... THAT'S weird," the goth girl said, clutching her belly. She hadn't been this hungry in her entire life. She felt like she could eat her entire bed! Her stomach groaned out again. "Grrr... okay, I've gotta put a stop to this," she grumbled, hopping down from her bed. She skittered down the hall, her stomach growling and gurgling echoing through the entire house. Her many bug siblings flew out to see just wht was causing such a racket. "Don't worry, its just me," Creepie assured them, "Just a little hungry is all..."

"Good Morning, Creepella!" Caroleena said cheerfully to her daughter.

"Mmnnnngh, morning, mom... do we have anything to eat?"

"Why of course, dear!" her mom said, placing a plate of eggs in front of her daughter. The weirdest sensation went through Creepie. She was hungry, STARVING even... but the eggs just weren't appealing to her. She wanted something a bit more... MEATY.

"Uhhmm.... nevermind, mom, I guess I'm NOT very hungry..." Creepie moaned. She NEEDED something in that belly. She usually LOVED her mother's cooking, but it just wasn't doing it for her today. She decided to...
114.title: She's going through puberty and needs food.

choices: She eats Chris Alice with her mouth.
She eats Chris Alice with her ass.
1141.content:
"Alright, mom, I'm going to school," Creepie called out as she skittered out the door.

"Okay dear, make sure you get something to eat! That stomach could wake the dead!" her mom chuckled.

People stared at Creepie as she walked along the sidewalk, her stomach sounding like an earthquake. As Creepie walked past them all, she couldn't help but think they looked more... appealing than they used to. She used to think that humans were freaky looking, but now, she was finding herself oddly attracted to them. She licked her plump purple lips. Her drool ran down her chin. They looked so... what was the word she was looking for... delicious? Not a word Creepie uses very often, but with every person she passed, her desire to just stuff one of them down her throat grew more and more. "Keep it together, Creepie..." she said to herself, wiping the sweat from her head, "Humans don't EAT other humans..." But the urge was getting too strong to ignore!

"HEY, CREEP- OOFH!" Creepie walked right into her peppy friend, Chris Alice, knocking both of them to the ground. "Ooohhh... Creepie, you're SUCH a silly!" she smiled.

"Sorry, Chris Alice, I've been a little... a little..." her jaw fell open. Her big, bulging eyes stared right at Chris Alice. So much flesh... so much... DELICIOUS flesh! Creepie had no idea what was coming over her! Chris Alice just looked so tasty and delicious and yummy and all sorts of different adjectives!

"Hmm? You okay, Creepie? You're kinda freaking me out!" the brunette said, tilting her head. Creepie couldn't take it anymore! She lunged out, pinning her friend to the ground. "EEP! CREEPIE, WHAT ARE YOU DOING?!" She kicked and squirmed and wriggled around, but Creepie would NOT let go. Her tongue licked Chris Alice's cheek, leaving a wet trail of drool.

"Mmmmm.... guess what?" Creepie said with a devilish grin, "You're goin' inside me!"

But what method should Creepie use?

Her tongue poked and prodded at Chris Alice's head, drenching her hair in saliva. "Mmnngh, Creepie, get OFF me!" She shook her head around, trying to throw Creepie off, but it was no use. Creepie had a death grip on her skull!

"Mmnnrrrmmmphhh..." was all Creepie could get out. Chris Alice's skin, her hair, every part of her just tasted SO GOOD! She needed more, MORE! She started to suck in more of Chris Alice's head, until her entire face was inside Creepie's mouth! Chris Alice could smell Creepie's warm breath.

"Eeeeeeew, Creepie!! Let me out of here!! Let me out let me out LET ME OUT!" she screamed. But Creepie was NOT letting her get away. She wasn't going to stop until she was completely gone! The brunette's head was bulging in Creepie's throat now, the wet, sticky walls squishing against her cheeks. "MMrmrmmhphh!!" she screamed as Creepie pushed her farther down. With a wet POP, Chris Alice's head popped into Creepie's stomach! The odor of the digesting mush and stomach acid soup was enough to make her vomit! It smelled just like the bathroom at the school. "Creepie, please, let me go! I'm going to be late for school! I've NEVER been late for school!" she screamed, but her pleas were futile. She giggled, squirming like a giant worm in Creepie's throat. The goth girl slurped up her friend's legs like noodles and removed her shoes. Her tongue flicked all over Chris Alice's little feet, making her curl and wriggle her toes frantically. "PFfaaahehehahaheheheee!! Creepie! Creepie PLEASE sstop! I'm ticklish!!" Chris Alice's giggling bellowed inside of Creepie, making her belly jiggle around.

Creepie decided it was finally time to end this. She gulped down her friend's tiny feet, sending her all the way down into her stomach with a loud splash. Creepie sat down on the ground, gently rubbing her newly expanded gut with her friend resting inside. "Wicked."

Well... her mom DID say to call if she needed anything...

"Mooooooooom? Can you come here for a minute?" she called down.

"Tasty you look." "Creepie! Let me go this instant! I'm not your breakfast I'm your mother!" "Not today." She said and stuffed her mom into her mouth, she tasted of green apples. "Mmmm, so good." Creepie said as she gulped, sending her squirming mother down to the gurgling pit that was her stomach. Creepie got up and rubbed her stomach, her mother could be heard screaming for Creepie to let her out and the struggles only felt good to Creepie. "I guess this is what being a pred is like." She chuckled, what now?

152.content: Caroleena sat in the living room of Dweezlwood Manor, her family's home since who knows when. She was laying down on the couch, watching a cooking show, her mouth watering at the sight of the hostess. "She looks delicious." She mumbled, but she soon realized what she was thinking. "Caroleena! Get a hold of yourself, you swore off humans once you adopted Creepie." She told herself before eyeing the woman again, drool coming back. "But she looks so juicy." She said as her stomach gave a loud growl. "Ooohhhh." She said, rubbing her hungry stomach. She hopped off the couch and walked to the kitchen, looking in both the fridge and pantry. "*Sigh* Nothing good." Her stomach gave another loud groan, but Caroleena heard something over her loud stomach, it was...
152.title: The Pro Pred Mother

info.brief_description: The girls from the show Growing up Creepie start eating people!
info.description:
This is a vore interactive of the show Growing up Creepie(duh) Here's the show in a nutshell:

Creepie was a waif left on the doorstep of the Dweezwold Mansion, which is a mansion located in the town of Middleington, which is home to a family of various insects. The family took her in and raised her as one of their own. However, she must now adjust to a life surrounded by a society of insectophobic humans as she attends Middlington Middle School and keeps her home life secret in order to protect both herself and her family.

Rules:
1.Any type of vore is allowed

2. Scat is allowed

3.Have fun!

4. If you need to know anything about the characters,setting,etc, just message me.
